thread.title: Political novice Conte named Italy's new PM

title: Political novice Conte named Italy's new PM
text:
Political novice Conte named Italy's new PM 8:22am EDT - 01:01
Giuseppe Conte, the law professor named as Italian prime minister on Wednesday after surviving accusations he inflated his academic credentials, must now prove he can lead the euro zone's third largest economy with no political experience. Scarlett Cvitanovich
Giuseppe Conte, the law professor named as Italian prime minister on Wednesday after surviving accusations he inflated his academic credentials, must now prove he can lead the euro zone's third largest economy with no political experience. Scarlett Cvitanovich //reut.rs/2IFAMpH
